name: Fengse Huanxiang 4: Shengzhan de Zhongyan
summary:
**This game is playable in Chinese only**

This installment of Fengse Huanxiang (Wind Fantasy) series is connected plot-wise to its predecessor, and is set in the same fantasy world and time line. The war between the countries of Ice and Fire devastated both those states, and Karin Seraphim, the white-haired leader of the special unit "Sin-Breaking Wings", found herself and her best friend in the opposite camps. Now, with the rulers of both countries dead, the war is finally over. However, there is a new disturbance in the Dragon Tomb. The Holy City of Nilu sends the priestess Niyi to investigate the matter. And when the young woman arrives at the tomb, she finds demons there... is this the beginning of a new war?
